greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, such that the g.f. of column k = G(x)^(2k+1) where G(x) = 1 + x*G(x)^3 is the g.f. of A001764 (ternary trees).
comment: Riordan array (G(x), x*G(x)). Let C(x) = 1 + x + 2*x^2 + 5*x^3 + 14*x^4 + ... be the o.g.f. of the Catalan numbers A000108. Then C(x*G(x)) = G(x).

This leads to a factorization of this array in the group of Riordan matrices as (1, x*G(x))*(C(x), x*C(x)) = (1 + A110616)*A033184 (here, in the final product, 1 refers to the 1 X 1 identity matrix and + means direct sum - see the Example section). (End)
formula: Top row of M^(n-1) gives n-th row terms of triangle A143603. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 07 2011
example: where g.f. of column k = G(x)^(2k+1) where G(x) = 1 + x*G(x)^3.
where g.f. of column k = (1-x)^(2k+1) for k>=0.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 29 2008
